bs-universalexport-desc: Enables MediaWiki to export pages into different formats
bs-universalexport-page-text-without-par: This page displays information about available export modules of the universal export.
bs-universalexport-tag-exclude-text: This text will not be exported.
bs-universalexport-tag-hidetitle-text: The title of this page will be not be visible in the export.
bs-universalexport-tag-excludearticle-te: This page may not be exported.
bs-universalexport-tag-pagebreak-desc: If supported by chosen export module, this tag forces a page break in the export document.
bs-universalexport-tag-noexport-desc: Content inside this tag will not be exported.
bs-universalexport-error-requested-expor: The requested format could not be produced.
bs-universalexport-error-permission: You have insufficient permissions to export this page.
bs-universalexport-error-requested-title: The requested page must not be exported because it is on category blacklist.
bs-universalexport-pref-metadatadefaults: Additional data in JSON format passed to the template
bs-universalexport-pref-metadataoverride: Allows specified values to be overriden by sending values entered here to the template in JSON format.
bs-universalexport-droplet-nopdf-descrip: Content within this section is excluded from the PDF export
bs-universalexport-droplet-pdfbreak-desc: Forces a page break at the set position during PDF export
